title: Which are the weakest IPL teams this year in the IPL? - Quora

response.answer_text: KKR is the weakest team this year in IPL 2018. In terms of batting they have Chris Lynn (who is very much injury prone) , Robin Uthappa, Dinesh Karthik, Shubhman Gill and Nitish Rana. Out of these Robin Uthappa & Nitish Rana are consistent having average of 30 with strike rate of 130. Chris Lynn is a big player but most of the time he is unavailable due to injuries. Shubhman Gill is not tested yet in IPL. In All rounders they have Andre Russell, Piyush Chawla, Cameron Delport, Shivam Mavi, Javon Searles. Out of these only Andre Russell is the quality all rounder (Having batting strike rate of 164 & Bowling Average of 25 with economy of 8 runs per over). Piyush Chawla is more likely a bowler. And the others have played very less matches. They have two wicketkeepers - Dinesh Karthik & Robin Uthappa. Their bowling department is their strength as they have big names like Sunil Narine, Mitchell Starc, Mitchell Johnson, Kuldeep Yadav, Kamlesh Nagarkoti & Vinay Kumar. Out of these Sunil Narine might not play due to illegal action and Mitchell Starc have always issues sometimes regarding injuries sometimes he takes rest due to workload. Otherwise all the bowlers are of good quality. In terms of captaincy Dinesh Karthik would be there who is tested at Ranji Level. So let's see how he would take this average looking team ahead. Sources - Cricbuzz & ESPN Cricinfo
